role: Integrate enhanced scanner outputs into planning workflows, impact analysis, and execution tracking

phase_1_verification.phase_1_status: COMPLETE - All required data structures available
phase_1_verification.verification_method: Re-read types.ts and context module to verify schema

available_for_task_1.description: Planning workflows with full type coverage
available_for_task_1.verification: ✅ VERIFIED - ElementData.type includes: interface, type, decorator, property

available_for_task_2.verification: ✅ VERIFIED - ElementData has dependencies (line 252), calledBy (line 254, synonym for usedBy), imports (lines 243-250)
available_for_task_2.note: calledBy and usedBy are synonyms - both mean 'elements that use/call this element'

available_for_task_3.verification: ✅ VERIFIED - ComplexityScorer class available in context module
available_for_task_3.note: Complexity not stored in ElementData but calculated on-demand via ComplexityScorer.scoreElement()

tasks.description: Update planning workflows (gather_context, create_plan) to use 95% accurate scanner data with full type coverage
tasks.implementation: Modify gather_context to read interfaces/decorators/type aliases from ElementData. Use AST scanner data with extended type support.
tasks.phase_1_dependency: ✅ COMPLETE - AST integration with interface/type/decorator/property detection
files_to_modify: src/handlers/gather_context.py - add Type System and Decorators sections
generators/planning_generator.py - consider type complexity in estimates

tasks.description: Enhance impact analysis to leverage relationship data (imports/exports/dependencies) for accurate change impact assessment
tasks.implementation: Use ElementData.dependencies and ElementData.calledBy (synonym for usedBy) for transitive dependency analysis. Generate impact graphs showing downstream effects.

available_fields.dependencies: string[] - modules/files this element depends on
available_fields.calledBy: string[] - elements that call/use this element (synonym for usedBy)

files_to_modify: src/handlers/impact_analysis.py (new or existing) - implement transitive traversal
generators/planning_analyzer.py - enhance dependency analysis with relationship data

tasks.description: Integrate complexity data into execution tracking for refactoring prioritization and risk assessment
tasks.implementation: Use ComplexityScorer class to calculate complexity metrics (LOC, parameters, cyclomatic complexity, score 0-10). Flag high-complexity elements as refactoring candidates.
tasks.phase_1_dependency: ✅ COMPLETE - ComplexityScorer available in context module
files_to_modify: src/handlers/execute_plan.py - calculate complexity for task elements
generators/planning_generator.py - adjust estimates based on complexity scores

decisions.decision: PROCEED WITH ALL 3 TASKS - Phase 1 dependencies verified complete
decisions.rationale: Re-verification of types.ts and context module confirmed all required data structures exist: ElementData has dependencies/calledBy/imports, ComplexityScorer provides complexity calculation. All tasks unblocked.
